data.author: Alvin Toffler

data.quote: I am a free lover. I have an inalienable, constitutional and natural right to love whom I may, to love as long or short a period as I can; to change that love every day if I please.

data.quote: Change is always tough. Even for those who see themselves as agents of change, the process of starting a new thing can cause times of disorientation, uncertainty and insecurity.

data.quote: I think comedy is a good way to help people change their minds. I think that if you're laughing and getting a message across, it's a lot easier than when somebody is screaming in your face.

data.quote: Our only security is our ability to change.

data.quote: Those people in New York are not gonna change me none.

data.quote: I shall always be consistent and never change my ways so long as I am in my senses; but for the sake of precedent the Senate should beware of binding itself to support the acts of any man, since he might through some mischance suffer a change.

data.quote: We won't be able to stop disasters from happening. On the contrary, climate change may increase the frequency and severity of floods, droughts and storms. But we are better equipped today to prepare for them and reduce their impact.

data.quote: Future shock is the shattering stress and disorientation that we induce in individuals by subjecting them to too much change in too short a time.

data.quote: The world hates change, yet it is the only thing that has brought progress.

data.quote: Change occurs in direct proportion to dissatisfaction, but dissatisfaction never changes.

data.quote: He that will not apply new remedies must expect new evils for time is the greatest innovator.

data.quote: All things must change to something new, to something strange.

data.quote: Change alone is unchanging.

data.quote: Everything in life that we really accept undergoes a change.

data.quote: I have noticed even people who claim everything is predestined, and that we can do nothing to change it, look before they cross the road.

data.quote: For changes to be of any true value, they've got to be lasting and consistent.

data.quote: An Internet meme is a hijacking of the original idea. data.quote: The question is not whether we are able to change but whether we are changing fast enough.

data.quote: A change in bad habits leads to a change in life.

data.quote: There's no reason to change what you are, but if you're not being you, then you need to acknowledge that.

data.quote: Do not let circumstances control you. You change your circumstances.

data.quote: Change is not an event, it's a process.

data.quote: I think the tiniest little thing can change the course of your day, which can change the course of your year, which can change who you are.

data.quote: I've never stopped being Argentine, and I've never wanted to. I feel very proud of being Argentine, even though I left there. data.quote: Fraud is common when you give away billions. Fraud related to Hurricane Katrina spending is estimated to top $2 billion. data.quote: Guns are part of the American psyche, aren't they? This is collateral damage for having a Wild West mentality. It's intrinsic to the American psyche. It's never going to change.

data.quote: Two places are ordained for man to dwell in after this life. While he is here, he may choose, by God's mercy, which he will; but once he is gone from here, he may not do so. data.quote: There was something undifferentiated and yet complete, which existed before Heaven and Earth. Soundless and formless, it depends on nothing and does not change. data.quote: If you compare Everest photographs in 1953 with its current state, things are melting. data.quote: I wouldn't change a thing about what I've done in the past because what may have been bad choices have all led me to this moment.

data.quote: My goal was never to just create a company. A lot of people misinterpret that, as if I don't care about revenue or profit or any of those things. data.quote: There's no sense in going to a tournament if you don't believe that you can win it. And that is the belief I have always had. And that is not going to change.

data.quote: I was wired to be intense. I don't think that's ever going to change.

data.quote: Is there climate change? I live in the shadow of some of the greatest climate change the world has ever seen. It's called the Rocky Mountains. When the glaciers went back.

data.quote: I would point out that if you're a believer in the Bible, one would have to say the Great Flood is an example of climate change and that certainly wasn't because mankind had overdeveloped hydrocarbon energy.

data.quote: One must change one's tactics every ten years if one wishes to maintain one's superiority.

data.quote: The why is what makes journalism an adult game. The why is what makes policy coherent and useful. The why is everything and without it, the very suggestion of human progress becomes a cosmic joke.
data.author: David Simon

data.quote: Really, each era has its own false nostalgia. We all put a picket fence up around something. For my generation it was the '50s, and for other generations it will be something else. Change is scary for everyone, as is complexity, contradiction, and an uncertain future.

data.quote: For good and evil, man is a free creative spirit. This produces the very queer world we live in, a world in continuous creation and therefore continuous change and insecurity.

data.quote: The faults of a superior person are like the sun and moon. They have their faults, and everyone sees them; they change and everyone looks up to them.

data.author: John Ashcroft

data.quote: The 200 years when Britain and the US were the top two economies were an aberration and that will change. The decline of empires has happened much faster than folks think. I believe that gold will be a far better bet in 20 years than the dollar.
data.author: Tom Winnifrith

data.quote: At a time when the GOP is playing games with the debt limit, a member of the Supreme Court is refusing to recuse himself from matters he has a financial interest in, and middle class incomes are stagnant, many want to change the subject. I don't. This was a prank, and a silly one. I'm focused on my work.
data.author: Anthony Weiner

data.quote: I have a way of filming things and staging them and designing sets. There were times when I thought I should change my approach, but in fact, this is what I like to do. It's sort of like my handwriting as a movie director. And somewhere along the way, I think I've made the decision: I'm going to write in my own handwriting.

data.quote: When I was 13, I was in my tent at Girl Scout camp, trying to change out of my bathing suit and talking at the same time. I fell out of the tent in front of everyone with my bathing suit around my ankles. I was humiliated - but no amount of humiliation has ever seemed to stop me.

data.quote: The important thing to remember, if you are trying something that is an innovation, is not to think too much about it. data.quote: As human beings we do change, grow, adapt, perhaps even learn and become wiser.
data.author: Wendy Carlos

data.quote: I have the ability to create and be in touch with God. I can't change bread and wine into body and blood, but I can take the scum or the slime of the earth and make it into a man or woman.
data.author: J. F. Powers

data.quote: Change is the only constant. Hanging on is the only sin.
data.author: Denise McCluggage

data.quote: The veterans of our military services have put their lives on the line to protect the freedoms that we enjoy. They have dedicated their lives to their country and deserve to be recognized for their commitment.
data.author: Judd Gregg

data.quote: True heroism is remarkably sober, very undramatic. It is not the urge to surpass all others at whatever cost, but the urge to serve others at whatever cost.
data.author: Arthur Ashe

data.quote: While only one day of the year is dedicated solely to honoring our veterans, Americans must never forget the sacrifices that many of our fellow countrymen have made to defend our country and protect our freedoms.
data.author: Randy Neugebauer

data.quote: Honoring the sacrifices many have made for our country in the name of freedom and democracy is the very foundation of Veterans Day.
data.author: Charles B. Rangel

data.quote: Duty, Honor, Country. Those three hallowed words reverently dictate what you ought to be, what you can be, what you will be.
data.author: Douglas MacArthur

data.quote: On this Veterans Day, let us remember the service of our veterans, and let us renew our national promise to fulfill our sacred obligations to our veterans and their families who have sacrificed so much so that we can live free.
data.author: Dan Lipinski

data.quote: The Lord gets his best soldiers out of the highlands of affliction.
data.author: Charles Spurgeon

data.quote: Our soldiers have nobly fought to protect freedom since our country's birth, and have fought to protect those that could not protect themselves, even in foreign lands when called upon.
data.author: John Linder

data.quote: Because all of us believe and understand in the fabric of the common bond of why we call ourselves American is to care for the men and women who wear the uniform; and when they take off the uniform, we care for them when they are veterans.
data.author: Steve Buyer

data.quote: The only thing that makes battle psychologically tolerable is the brotherhood among soldiers. You need each other to get by.
data.author: Sebastian Junger

data.quote: America's Veterans have served their country with the belief that democracy and freedom are ideals to be upheld around the world.
data.author: John Doolittle

data.quote: Tragically, the effort to make America and the world safer and to defend freedom around the world is not without an enormous cost to this Nation in terms primarily of lost lives and those who bear the scars and the wounds of war, and their families who must bear these losses.
data.author: John Warner

data.quote: Spending time with America's soldiers is always inspiring.
data.author: John Boehner

data.quote: The U.S. Military is us. There is no truer representation of a country than the people that it sends into the field to fight for it. The people who wear our uniform and carry our rifles into combat are our kids, and our job is to support them, because they're protecting us.
data.author: Tom Clancy

data.quote: The precondition to freedom is security.
data.author: Rand Beers

data.quote: Well, look at what people are doing for returned veterans now. The wounded warriors. They're working hard to make the wounded veterans feel that they are loved and welcomed home, unlike Vietnam. It was not a very kind, gentle world then. I think we are kinder and gentler.
data.author: Barbara Bush

data.quote: America's trying to do the best for its veterans.
data.author: R. Lee Ermey

data.quote: The reward of one duty is the power to fulfill another.
data.author: George Eliot

data.quote: I go where the sound of thunder is.
data.author: Alfred M. Gray

data.quote: When soldiers have been baptized in the fire of a battle-field, they have all one rank in my eyes.
data.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

data.quote: A few honest men are better than numbers.
data.author: Oliver Cromwell

data.quote: Perfect Valor is to do, without a witness, all that we could do before the whole world.
data.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

data.quote: The thing is this: You got to have fun while you're fightin' for freedom, 'cause you don't always win.
data.author: Molly Ivins

data.quote: As a former veteran, I understand the needs of veterans, and have been clear - we will work together, stand together with the Administration, but we will also question their policies when they shortchange veterans and military retirees.
data.author: Solomon Ortiz

data.quote: There is nothing like staying at home for real comfort.
data.author: Jane Austen

data.quote: We are a country where people of all backgrounds, all nations of origin, all languages, all religions, all races, can make a home. America was built by immigrants.

data.quote: Home is where children find safety and security, where we find our identities, where citizenship starts. It usually starts with believing you're part of a community, and that is essential to having a stable home.
data.author: Matthew Desmond

data.quote: If you go anywhere, even paradise, you will miss your home.
data.author: Malala Yousafzai

data.quote: When everyone at school is speaking one language, and a lot of your classmates' parents also speak it, and you go home and see that your community is different -there is a sense of shame attached to that. It really takes growing up to treasure the specialness of being different.

data.quote: When I come home, my daughter will run to the door and give me a big hug, and everything that's happened that day just melts away.

data.quote: The ache for home lives in all of us, the safe place where we can go as we are and not be questioned.

data.quote: America's future will be determined by the home and the school. The child becomes largely what he is taught; hence we must watch what we teach, and how we live.

data.quote: On the battlefield, the military pledges to leave no soldier behind. As a nation, let it be our pledge that when they return home, we leave no veteran behind.

data.quote: The American People will come first once again. My plan will begin with safety at home - which means safe neighborhoods, secure borders, and protection from terrorism. There can be no prosperity without law and order.

data.quote: Charity begins at home, and justice begins next door.

data.quote: If you go back to your home town or you're reunited with school friends, its always slightly bittersweet because as much as there's nice things in terms of seeing them again, the town has changed without you, and you're no longer a part of it.

data.quote: Most people, if you live in a big city, you see some form of schizophrenia every day, and it's always in the form of someone homeless. 'Look at that guy - he's crazy. He looks dangerous.' Well, he's on the streets because of mental illness. He probably had a job and a home.
data.author: Eric McCormack

data.quote: The beach is definitely where I feel most at home. It's my oxygen. I forget how much I need it sometimes when I'm away working.
data.author: Behati Prinsloo

data.quote: I have two homes, like someone who leaves their hometown and/or parents and then establishes a life elsewhere. They might say that they're going home when they return to see old friends or parents, but then they go home as well when they go to where they live now. Sarajevo is home, Chicago is home.

data.quote: Have nothing in your house that you do not know to be useful, or believe to be beautiful.
data.author: William Morris

data.quote: I train and I go home, and when I'm home, I think about training. That's my life every day, and that's it.

data.quote: Every time I slip into the ocean, it's like going home.
data.author: Sylvia Earle

data.quote: Home is where one starts from.
data.author: T. S. Eliot

data.quote: Bride and groom are not just two contracting parties but two loving and beloved companions, joined in establishing a home that will be nothing less than a source of immortality.

data.quote: The thrill of coming home has never changed.

data.quote: Every dog is a lion at home.

data.quote: A home without books is a body without soul.
data.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

data.quote: Life is hard, and a lot of people come home tired from work. If they're gonna spend half an hour reading, they want some entertainment and a sense of achievement. So that's what I give them. That's all I'm trying to do. Is that really so wrong?

data.quote: I am not going to die, I'm going home like a shooting star.

data.quote: Here's kind of my motto - if you're not happy at home, you're not happy anywhere else.

data.quote: Yes, your home is your castle, but it is also your identity and your possibility to be open to others.

data.quote: It may be that the satisfaction I need depends on my going away, so that when I've gone and come back, I'll find it at home.

data.quote: I long, as does every human being, to be at home wherever I find myself.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: A good wife is someone who thinks she has done everything right: raising the kids, being there for the husband, being home, trying to do it all.

data.quote: After school, I'd wait for someone to pick me up and no one would, so I'd be like, 'I guess I'll walk home.' I had to be a hustler, because nobody did anything for me.

data.quote: There are a thousand ways to kneel and kiss the ground there are a thousand ways to go home again.
data.author: Rumi

data.quote: To meditate means to go home to yourself. Then you know how to take care of the things that are happening inside you, and you know how to take care of the things that happen around you.
data.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

data.quote: My restless, roaming spirit would not allow me to remain at home very long.
data.author: Buffalo Bill

data.quote: Home is, I suppose just a child's idea. A house at night, and a lamp in the house. A place to feel safe.
data.author: V. S. Naipaul

data.quote: When we rebuild a house, we are rebuilding a home. When we recover from disaster, we are rebuilding lives and livelihoods.
data.author: Sri Mulyani Indrawati

data.quote: Of all the home remedies, a good wife is best.
data.author: Kin Hubbard

data.quote: You can have more than one home. You can carry your roots with you, and decide where they grow.
data.author: Henning Mankell

data.quote: Child abuse and neglect offend the basic values of our state. We have a responsibility to provide safe settings for at-risk children and facilitate permanent placement for children who cannot return home.
data.author: Matt Blunt

data.quote: You spend your whole lifetime in your occupation, actually making life clever, easy and convenient for white people. data.author: Rosa Parks

data.quote: But I do believe that a woman's truest place is in a home, with a husband and with children, and with large freedom, pecuniary freedom, personal freedom, and the right to vote.
data.author: Lucy Stone

data.quote: Home is where you feel at home and are treated well.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: It's 5 P.M. at the office. Working fast, you've finished your tasks for the day and want to go home. But none of your colleagues have left yet, so you stay another hour or two, surfing the Web and reading your e-mails again, so you don't come off as a slacker. It's an unfortunate reality that efficiency often goes unrewarded in the workplace.
data.author: Robert Pozen

data.quote: After a century of trying, we declared that healthcare in America is not a privilege for a few, it is a right for everybody. After decades of talk, we finally began to wean ourselves off foreign oil. We doubled our production of clean energy. We brought more of our troops home to their families, and we delivered justice to Osama bin Laden.

data.quote: You never know what events are going to transpire to get you home.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: There are only two things we should fight for. One is the defense of our homes and the other is the Bill of Rights.

data.quote: The prospect of going home is very appealing.

data.quote: The only foes that threaten America are the enemies at home, and these are ignorance, superstition and incompetence.
data.author: Elbert Hubbard

data.quote: I don't think I'm a workaholic. Every weekend, I invite my colleagues and friends to my home to play cards. We have a lot of fun.

data.quote: It is often easier to become outraged by injustice half a world away than by oppression and discrimination half a block from home.
data.author: Carl T. Rowan

data.quote: I believe in exploration, and I will miss being on the front lines of that endeavor. On one hand, I look forward to going home, but it's something that's been a big part of my life, and I'm going to miss it.

data.quote: Home is any four walls that enclose the right person.
data.author: Helen Rowland

data.quote: Life doesn't get more real than having a newborn at home.
data.author: Eric Church

data.quote: After a really hectic week, I hate going out on a Friday evening, so I'll always opt for a night at home.

data.quote: My dinners at home are startlingly simple. Every night, I stop at the market near my hotel and pick up a steak, lamb chops or some liver, which I broil in the electric oven in my room. I usually eat four or five raw carrots with my meat, and that is all. I must be part rabbit; I never get bored with raw carrots.

data.quote: After I hit a home run I had a habit of running the bases with my head down. I figured the pitcher already felt bad enough without me showing him up rounding the bases.

data.quote: I like to feel the butterflies in the stomach, I like to go home and have a restless night and wonder how I'm going to be able to accomplish this feat, get jittery. That hunger and those butterflies in the stomach are very essential for all creative people.

data.quote: We need to have a strong economy that can create employment opportunities and that can also produce the revenue that we need to defend our country at home and abroad.

data.quote: Breathe in deeply to bring your mind home to your body. You can see that she is not beautiful when she says things that are unkind.
data.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

data.quote: Your best T-shirt should be like your bed it just feels like you are home when you are in it.

data.quote: I'm a very private person. I like staying home and doing my stuff. I hate people invading on my privacy. I hate talking about my private life.

data.quote: Africa for the Africans... at home and abroad!
data.author: Marcus Garvey

data.quote: All I did was pray to God, every day. In prison camp, the main prayer was, 'Get me home alive, God, and I'll seek you and serve you.' I came home, got wrapped up in the celebration, and forgot about the hundreds of promises I'd made to God.

data.quote: The lonely wanderer, who watches by the seashore the waves that roll between him and his home, talks of cruel facts, material barriers that, just because they are material, and not ideal, shall be the irresistible foes of his longing heart.

data.quote: There is one timeless way of building. It is a thousand years old, and the same today as it has ever been. data.quote: Home is where you are appreciated, safe and protected, creative, and where you are loved - not where you are put in prison.

data.quote: I love my family, my wife, my kids, my dogs, my home, my life. I am a very happy and contented man.

data.quote: It's more pressure on women to - if they marry or partner with someone, to partner with the right person. Because you cannot have a full career and a full life at home with your children if you are also doing all of the housework and child care.

data.quote: I'm really quite simple. I plant flowers and watch them grow... I stay at home and watch the river flow.

We were literally stripped clean.

data.quote: The killer app that got the world ready for appliances was the light bulb. So the light bulb is what wired the world. And they weren't thinking about appliances when they wired the world. data.quote: We love our planet Earth. We should - it is our home, and there's no place like home. There can't ever be a better place than Earth.

data.quote: I just like sitting at home, chilling and watching a movie.
data.author: Niall Horan

data.quote: Let architects sing of aesthetics that bring Rich clients in hordes to their knees; Just give me a home, in a great circle dome Where stresses and strains are at ease.

data.quote: The instruction we find in books is like fire. We fetch it from our neighbours, kindle it at home, communicate it to others, and it becomes the property of all.

data.quote: Sometimes I can't think of a better way to end my day than coming home and just strumming my ukulele for a few minutes. I mean, I joke around and tell people that it's an entire yoga session in one strum, you know?

data.quote: You don't have to swing hard to hit a home run. If you got the timing, it'll go.
data.author: Yogi Berra

data.quote: Everybody thinks I'm, like, a bad boy. I've had my day, but I just sit at home and play the blues mostly.

data.quote: Whether at work, at home or in public, we have been trained to believe that who we are at the core of our being is often unacceptable. data.quote: I'm one of the most adaptable guys I know in as much as travelling is my favourite thing to do in life. With every place I go, I try to stay there long enough to do it justice, long enough so that I can at least imagine what it would be like to live there. Once I imagine that, then it's OK for me to return home.

data.quote: No matter what happens in a child's home, no matter what other social and economic factors may impede a child, there's no question in my mind that a first-rate school can transform almost everything.

data.quote: I am not Superwoman. The reality of my daily life is that I'm juggling a lot of balls in the air trying to be a good wife and mother, trying to be the prime-ministerial consort at home and abroad, barrister and charity worker, and sometimes one of the balls gets dropped.
data.author: Cherie Blair

data.quote: Somebody once asked me if I ever went up to the plate trying to hit a home run. I said, 'Sure, every time.'

data.quote: My wife met me at the door the other night in a sexy negligee. Unfortunately, she was just coming home.
data.author: Rodney Dangerfield

data.quote: Oh, my ways are strange ways and new ways and old ways, And deep ways and steep ways and high ways and low, I'm at home and at ease on a track that I know not, And restless and lost on a road that I know.

data.quote: I've always looked for the perfect life to step into. I've taken all the paths to get where I wanted. But no matter where I go, I still come home.

data.quote: Home ownership is the cornerstone of a strong community.

data.quote: I watched Titanic when I got back home from the hospital, and cried. I knew that my IQ had been damaged.

data.quote: It's not about finding a home so much as finding yourself.

data.quote: New England is the home of all that is good and noble with all her sternness and uncompromising opinions.
data.author: Ellen Swallow Richards

data.quote: Price is rarely the most important thing. A cheap product might sell some units. Somebody gets it home and they feel great when they pay the money, but then they get it home and use it and the joy is gone.

data.quote: What I've learned in my life, it's a very interesting social study for me, to go back and forth between being the guy at home and being the guy on the road and being the guy in studio and being the guy in the interview. data.quote: I'm a firm believer that lighting affects mood, and twinkly lights on strings bring something magical to occasions ranging from concerts to weddings, though I'm fond of using them as year-round home decor. data.author: Erin Morgenstern

data.quote: Most people know that forests are the lungs of our planet, literally playing a critical role in every breath we take. And that they're also home to incredible animals like the orangutan and elephant, which will go extinct if we keep cutting down their forests.

data.quote: I am alone a lot, which is good. I need that time to just be alone after a long day, just decompress. So, I go to either my house or the hotel, or my apartment, or whatever - wherever I am, I go home and I watch TV and I sit there, with my cat, and I just watch TV or go online, check my emails.

data.quote: Think you're escaping and run into yourself. Longest way round is the shortest way home.
data.author: James Joyce

data.quote: If your neighbors think you're a detective because a cop always brings you home, you might be a redneck.
data.author: Jeff Foxworthy

data.quote: An oligarchy of race, where the Saxon rules the African, might be endured; but this oligarchy of sex which makes father, brothers, husband, sons, the oligarchs over the mother and sisters, the wife and daughters of every household... carries discord and rebellion into every home of the nation.

data.quote: I hate leaving home. I love what I do, but I'd love to go home every night.

data.quote: Delhi is my emotional home. I still dream of owning a home there.

data.author: Robert Plant

data.quote: A well-designed home has to be very comfortable. I can't stand the aesthetes, the minimal thing. I can't live that way. My home has to be filled with stuff - mostly paintings, sculpture, my fish lamps, cardboard furniture, lots of books.

data.quote: My kids are just waiting for me at home. I'm their father. They're wondering, 'When's Daddy coming home?'

data.quote: I'm still living the life where you get home and open the fridge and there's half a pot of yogurt and a half a can of flat Coca-Cola.

data.quote: Home is one's birthplace, ratified by memory.

data.quote: Palestine is our unforgettable historic home. The very name would be a force of marvelous potency for summoning our people together.

data.quote: Going home helps the content.

data.quote: I have no idea how to get in touch with anyone anymore. Everyone, it seems, has a home phone, a cell phone, a regular e-mail account, a Facebook account, a Twitter account, and a Web site. Some of them also have a Google Voice number. There are the sentimental few who still have fax machines.
data.author: Susan Orlean

data.quote: I love traveling all over the world but it's true: there's nothing like home.
data.author: Dolly Parton

data.quote: Anytime you're in West Virginia or near it, and you sing, 'Take Me Home, Country Roads,' it's a sight to behold.
data.author: Brad Paisley

data.quote: I just owe almost everything to my father and it's passionately interesting for me that the things that I learned in a small town, in a very modest home, are just the things that I believe have won the election.

data.quote: The coolest thing, and I have it at home, is a huge Hulk Hogan, normal-sized pinball machine. When people come over they play it for hours. When you hit the bumpers and the bells ring it goes, 'Oh yeah!' The whole time you're playing this machine it's yelling and screaming at you, 'What you gonna do, brother?!' I think that's the coolest.
